Habitat . – Rivers or streams on islands or coastal areas.

Remarks. – Cai et al. (2006) recently designated a neotype for
C. exilirostris Stimpson, 1860
from Okinawa, Ryukyu Islands, and regarded it as a junior synonym of
Caridina typus.
In Peninsular Malaysia , C. typus is only known from offshore islands (present study).
Distribution . – Widely distributed in the Indo-West Pacific (Cai et al., 2006).
